inclusion.criterion: pregnant patient between 10 and 14 weeks of gestation + 6 days
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: medical history requiring anticoagulation (antiphospholipid syndrome, deep vein thromboembolic disease, pulmonary embolism, atherothrombosis, patient with mechanical heart valves)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patient receiving aspirin for another indication outside pregnancy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old Asian female infant presenting with jaundice. She was born at 38w3d of gestation, after an uncomplicated pregnancy.
